name: Railboss
overview: You are a pioneer railwayman in charge of building a line in the American West between Base City and Junction City. It's your job to hire and fire surveyors, workers and guards to protect you and your workforce against marauding bandits. By building stations along the route, you can generate income to pay your 'workforce and buy additional stock should you require it. To thwart your efforts, warlike Indians try to disrupt your work by killing members of the workforce and ripping up the track. Your only hope is that the cavalry from Fort Commodore can get to the Indians before they get to you. A game for budding pioneersmen everywhere.
